welcome.title: Welcome & Integration
welcome.description: Information, orientation and personalized support to facilitate your settlement.
welcome.fullDescription: Our welcome and integration service supports immigrants through professional counsellors offering comprehensive assistance for personal and professional integration.
welcome.details: Free service offered in French, English, Spanish, Arabic and other languages. In-person or phone appointments.

sections.title: Part-time Courses

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.statement: Welcome, help and accompany immigrants in their personal, social and professional integration.
mission.vision: Serve and unite through innovative expertise and practices for a better life together.
mission.historyIntro: Created in 1989, the Centre d'Accueil et de Référence sociale et économique pour Immigrants de Saint-Laurent (CARI St-Laurent) is a non-profit, non-denominational and non-partisan organization.
mission.approach: An intercultural approach based on respect for difference, openness to others and ethnocultural and religious diversity.
mission.impact: Over 7,000 people supported each year, from 128 countries and speaking 95 different languages.

slides.title: Diversity Brings Us Together
slides.subtitle: Our Mission
slides.description: For over 30 years, CARI has been supporting immigrants in their personal, social and professional integration in Quebec.
slides.fullContent:
CARI St-Laurent is a non-profit community organization whose mission is to welcome immigrants, help them settle, adapt and integrate into Quebec society.

Every year, our teams support thousands of people from over 128 countries in their first steps, French language learning, job search and integration into Montreal life.

Our approach is unique: we consider each person as a whole.

slides.title: Intercultural Matching
slides.subtitle: Matching Program
slides.description: Build authentic connections with Quebecers! Our intercultural matching program fosters exchanges and integration through enriching encounters.
slides.fullContent:
CARI intercultural matching program creates a social and linguistic bridge between newcomers and Quebecers.

Each match is a unique opportunity to discover Quebec culture, practice French and build lasting friendships.

Meetings are flexible: cultural outings, shared meals, sports activities, neighbourhood discovery and more.

slides.title: Tax Clinic
slides.subtitle: Seasonal Service
slides.description: Need help with your tax return? Our tax clinic is open to immigrants and low-income individuals.
slides.fullContent:
Every year, CARI offers a tax preparation service for immigrants and low-income families.

Our trained volunteers help you prepare your federal and provincial tax returns. This service ensures you receive the credits and benefits you are entitled to.

Bring all your tax documents (T4, slips, receipts) and identification.
